Details.Name: sc_card_name
Details.Feature: Citibank Smrt Platinum Visa Card

Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Redeem your SMRT$ for vouchers and free rides.
Enjoy up to 7% savings on groceries at FairPrice Supermarkets, Giant and Sheng Siong, up to 15% savings on coffee and up to 5% savings on toys & books.
Doubles as an EZ-Link Card for daily commute with an auto top-up function.

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: $120 cash rebate

Details.Name: sc_gift_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Apply for 2 Citibank Credit Cards and receive approval within 30 days from date of application.
2. Charge a minimum of S$200 per month on either one of the cards for 6 consecutive months.
3. Receive a maximum of $20 cashback per month for 6 consecutive months.

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: 2% SMRT$ is awarded for EZ-Reload transactions of more than S$30.25. 1% SMRT$ is awarded for EZ-Reload transactions of S$30.25 or less.

5% SMRT$ is awarded for transactions of $50 and above. 3% SMRT$ is awarded for transactions less than $50. Citi Rebate is awarded to transactions made at Sheng Siong and Giant only. 2% Citi Rebate is awarded for transactions of $50 and above. 1% Citi Rebate is awarded for transactions of $20 to less than $50. Other Citi Rebate terms and conditions apply.
10% Citi Rebate is awarded for transactions made at Starbucks outlets in Singapore only. Other Citi Rebate terms and conditions apply.
For monthly statement spend of less than $600, SMRT$ earn rate will be 0.3% less.
Maximum of 280 SMRT$ can be earned during any 12-month period following card issued or renewal.

Details.Name: sc_cashback_details
Details.Feature: Up to 15% rebates in the form of SMRT$ (Capped at 280 SMRT$ every 12 month period)
Up to 7% savings on groceries
Up to 15% savings on coffee
Up to 5% savings on toys & books
Minimum monthly statement spend more than $600
0.3% on all other spend

Details.Name: sc_grocery_details
Details.Feature: Up to 7% at Fairprice, Giant and Sheng Siong (Fairprice supermarket outlets include FairPrice, FairPrice Xtra and FairPrice Finest)
Redeem S$10 Giant or Sheng Shiong voucher for 10 SMRT$1

Details.Name: sc_petrol_details
Details.Feature: 14% discount at Esso stations - 5% Esso site discount + 5% Smiles card discount + 4% Citicard discount
13.6% discount at Shell stations - 5% Shell site discount + 5% Shell Escape discount + 4% Citi Rebate (applies after Shell discount)
